title: 491-Jeff Ross-Your Mom's House with Christina P and Tom Segura
description:
The Roast Master General is in the building. Hilarious, original and always evolving what a comedy special can be. Jeff Ross has always been a favorite of ours and this podcast solidifies that. 

Jeff is open and honest and slings that roast joke advice for all you lookin to toast someone.

PLUS, Josh Potter jumps in the seat and updates us on his attempt to, you know, finish.
